entry.string:
kubectl apply -f deploy.prod.yml kubectl patch deployment onemg-data-tranfer-prod -p "{\"spec\":{\"template\":{\"metadata\":{\"labels\":{\"date\":\"`date +'%s'`\"}}}}}" -n swm kubectl rollout status deployment onemg-data-tranfer-prod -n swm
kubectl apply -f deploy-cronjob.prod.yml kubectl patch deployment onemg-data-tranfer-cronjob-prod -p "{\"spec\":{\"template\":{\"metadata\":{\"labels\":{\"date\":\"`date +'%s'`\"}}}}}" -n swm kubectl rollout status deployment onemg-data-tranfer-cronjob-prod -n swm
